name: CVE-2019-18218
description: cdf_read_property_info in cdf.c in file through 5.37 does not restrict the number of CDF_VECTOR elements, which allows a heap-based buffer overflow (4-byte out-of-bounds write).
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:file_project:file:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:8.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:9.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:10.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:opensuse:leap:15.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:active_iq_unified_manager:*:*:*:*:*:linux:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:29:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:30:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:31:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:18.04:*:*:*:lts:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:19.04:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:14.04:*:*:*:esm:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:19.10:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:16.04:*:*:*:esm:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:12.04:*:*:*:-:*:*:*')]
